mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ddxb_parent( id, stu_id, weixin_acount, `head_img`, `nick_name`, `gender`, `parent_name`, `phone_number`, `create_time`, `update_time` ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{stuId}, #{weixinAcount}, #{headImg}, #{nickName}, #{gender}, #{parentName} #{phoneNumber}, now(), #{updateTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ddxb_parent SET weixin_acount = #{weixinAcount}, head_img = #{headImg}, nick_name = #{nickName}, gender = #{gender}, parent_name = #{parentName}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, update_time = now() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id as id, stu_id as stuId, weixin_acount as weixinAcount, head_img as headImg, nick_name as nickName, gender as gender, parent_name as parentName, phone_number as phoneNumber, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime FROM ddxb_parent WHERE stu_id = #{stuId}
